name: 2 PACK Millennium Tanning SOLID BLACK 100X Dark Tanning Lotion Indoor Outdoor Tan Enhancing Silicone Bronzer Tanning Bed Lotion 13.5 Fl oz (400 ml)
short_description: 100X BRONZING POWER - Get a deep, dark and long-lasting tan with this dark tanning accelerator. This powerful formula is designed to enhance your natural tan and give you 100 times more bronzing power. Say goodbye to pale skin and hello to a gorgeous, sun-kissed glow!

ULTRA-DARK INDOOR/OUTDOOR TANNING LOTION - Achieve a deep, natural tan with this powerful tan oil. Formulated for use both indoors and outdoors, this lotion contains a silicone bronzer to enhance your tan and leave your skin glowing. Experience 100X dark results with this easy-to-use tanning lotion.

INTENSE, DEEP, AND LONG-LASTING TAN RESULTS - Achieve the ultimate bronzed glow with our Indoor-Outdoor Tanning Accelerator. This powerful lotion will enhance and extend your tan for a darker, richer, and longer-lasting result. Perfect for those seeking intense and deep tanning results.

SUITABLE FOR USE IN TANNING BEDS AND OUTDOORS - Achieve a deep, dark tan both indoors and outdoors with this specially formulated lotion. Its silicone bronzer and Tan Enhancing properties make it the perfect choice for those seeking a dark tanning bed lotion.
ENHANCED WITH SKIN-NOURISHING VITAMINS - This Tan lotion is infused with vitamins to nourish your skin, leaving it feeling soft and smooth while achieving a deep, dark tan.

name: Coconut Dream Ultra Dark Tanning with Clear Bronzers, 8 oz.
short_description: Extended 15X clear bronzers work gradually and effectively to develop a rich, streak-free tan while helping maintain your golden glow for up to seven full days of radiance.
A luxurious fusion of golden coconut oil, shea butter, monoi de Tahiti, and skin-loving vitamins nourishes deeply to leave skin softer, healthier, and visibly more radiant.
The irresistible Coconut Dream fragrance wraps your senses in a warm, tropical aroma, making every tanning session feel like an exotic, sun-soaked island getaway.
Formulated with premium ingredients and designed for both indoor and outdoor tanning, this original tanning lotion enhances your color while conditioning your skin.
Aloe vera-rich formula soothes and replenishes skin that’s been exposed to UV rays, helping to reduce redness, dryness, and irritation while enhancing overall tan longevity.
product_description: Drench yourself in this rich, ultra dark tanning lotion with clear bronzers designed to give you a luscious, tropical tan color to be envied by all. Your skin will love the natural moisturizing benefits of golden coconut oil, shea butter, monoi de Tahiti oil along with the replenishing action of natural aloe Vera.

name: Tan Asz U Beach Black Rum Tanning Lotion, Double Shot 400X Bronzer, Dark Reserve Peptide Infusion, Luxe Indoor Tanning Lotion with Coconut Water & Algae Extract, 13.5 Fl Oz
short_description: Ultra-Dark 400X Bronzer: DHA-free Double Shot 400X bronzing blend delivers intense yet balanced golden-brown color for a deep, vacation-worthy tan
Coconut Water & Peptides: Coconut water base conditions skin for a stunning tone while Dark Reserve Peptides infuse your tan with a remarkable depth, radiance and a nourished feel
Algae Extract & Charcoal: Organic algae and black charcoal help nourish and beautify your bronze while the fluid formula wraps skin in incredible softness for a smooth finish
Clean Beauty & Scent: Vegan, cruelty free and free of gluten, parabens and phthalates; Features a Bahama Breeze fragrance for an indulgent, beach-ready tanning experience
How to Use: Apply evenly to clean, dry skin before indoor tanning, wash hands after use; Does not contain SPF so pair with appropriate sun protection outdoors
product_description: Escape to pristine beaches, warm sun and a jaw-droppingly beautiful tan with Tan Asz U Beach Black Rum Double Shot 400X Bronzer. This DHA-free dark tanning lotion pours on color with a Double Shot 400X bronzing blend, helping create intense yet balanced golden-brown results. A coconut water base conditions skin for a superb tan while Dark Reserve Peptide Infusion, organic algae and black charcoal work together to nourish skin and add depth to your bronze. Max Silicones wrap skin in a smooth, silky feel, finished with a Bahama Breeze fragrance that brings vacation vibes to every session. Designed for indoor tanning beds and does not contain SPF or provide sun protection, so always pair with appropriate protection when exposed to the sun. Paradise rarely comes so easily, so prepare for envy; a coconut water base, potent peptides, and algae extract helps ensure a tan that looks and feels radiant.

product_description: This spell of the islands lasts long after the clock strikes twelve with Tan Asz U Midnight Maui Double Shot 400X Bronzer. The secrets of Maui’s sun, sand and surf transport body and mind to island paradise, your goddess glow making every moment a photo-perfect event you'll want to capture. Infused with an ultra-potent Double Shot 400X bronzing blend, this luxurious tanning lotion delivers dramatically dark results that continue to develop after your session. Black Pearl and Peptide Illuminator leaves skin glowing with radiant warmth and a smooth, luminous tone, while the Inktuition tattoo enhancing complex helps body art stand out against your rich bronze. The ultra-hydrating formula leaves skin soft, silky and beach-ready, finished with the tropical Mandarin Maui Colada fragrance so every application feels like a mini vacation. Designed for tanning beds and does not contain SPF or provide sun protection, so always pair with appropriate protection when exposed to the sun.
